name: Baxton_Studio_Chateau_Storage_Shoe_Black_Cabinet
reviews: It took us few hours to put it together and it looked beautiful! However once we put it up, one of the doors opened and the hinges broke out and the draw dropped. Didn't even get to use it. Very poor quality. Would not buy or recommend this product.

We bought this to house our shoes, since our puppy started going through a shoe chewing phase. Overall, it looks great and holds everything we need it to. The reason I gave it 3 stars is because the screw securing the tip-out drawer for shoes comes out with light, daily use (2-5 x opening/day), making the shoe storage unusable. This also scuffs up the piece around the inside of the affected drawer opening side. It is fairly easy to put the screw back in, but it takes time. We've had this happen twice now, since buying this piece earlier this month.
description:
This contemporary-styled storage cabinet will help you tap into your home's underutilized vertical storage space. Its fold-out rack provides convenient access to shoes and riding spurs.

 Contemporary storage cabinet  Fold-out rack for shoes and riding spurs   Engineered wood construction Faux walnut wood grain on paper veneer   Assembly required To clean wipe with dry cloth Set includes: One (1) Shoe Cabinet only Material: engineered wood/ white and walnut finishing PU veneer Finish: Black/Walnut, white/Walnut Left Drawer: 4.875 inches high x 19.5 inches wide x 6.25 inches deep Left Shoe Rack (2) : 19.5 inches high x 8.875 inches wide x 6.25 inches deep Right Shelf from top to bottom (3) : 11.75 inches high x 11.5 inches wide x 9.375 inches deep Overal Dimensions: 37.8 inches high x 35.1 inches wide x 11.8 inches deepMaterialWoodAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBlack
